mapper.insert: insert into jy_student (id, name, sex, identity, family_id, poor_id, village, group) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update jy_student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_id = #{familyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, poor_id = #{poorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, village = #{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, sex, identity, family_id, poor_id, village, group from jy_student
